channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Hello, i'm a Mac user, and i've been looking for a 508 or higher revision server (client + source) that I could run on my computer. It doesn't have to have anything fancy on it or anything, just something that WORKS. I've been looking for a 508+ server for about a year, and can't find any compatible with my Mac. This is really frustrating. Hopefully someone will read this and will acknowledge my request! :3
-TimeFcuk
